src:
Reaksi Netizen Usai Duel Dramatis Chelsea vs Ajax, Ada yang Sindir MU
06 Nov 2019, 12:32 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Banjir gol tercipta di laga Liga Champions yang mempertemukan Chelsea vs Ajax Amsterdam. Laga yang digelar di Stamford Bridge, Rabu (6/11/2019) ini berakhir dengan skor 4-4.
The Blues sempat tertinggal 1-3 lebih dahulu di babak pertama lewat dua gol bunuh diri dari Tammy Abraham dan Kepa Arrizabalaga, serta satu gol dari Quincy Promes. Tuan rumah sempat memperkecil skor lewat penalti Jorginho.
Di awal babak kedua perjuangan Chelsea semakin berat setelah Donny van de Beek memperbesar kedudukan menjadi 1-4 untuk tim tamu. Namun Chelsea kemudian bangkit dan memaksakan mencetak tiga gol tambahan lewat Cesar Azpilicueta, Jorginho, dan Reece James.
Selain hujan gol yang tercipta, sederet drama turut mewarnai pertandingan tersebut. Ajax Amsterdam harus rela bermain dengan sembilan pemain dan mendapat hukuman penalti sebanyak dua kali.
Sementara untuk Chelsea, dua gol mereka dianulir wasit. Gol Tammy Abraham dianulir karena offside dan gol kedua Cesar Azpilicueta dibatalkan VAR.
Kontroversi lain terjadi saat wasit keempat memberikan tambahan waktu empat menit. Manajer Chelsea, Frank Lampard sempat heran dengan keputusan tersebut. Padahal di babak kedua, terjadi banyak pelanggaran yang memakan waktu lama.
Sontak pertandingan Chelsea kontra Ajax menjadi bahan perbincangan di media sosial Twitter dan menjadi trending topik. Berikut beberapa cuitan menarik netizen yang mengiringi pertandingan seru ini.
text:
Netizens Reaction After Dramatic Duel Chelsea vs Ajax, There are MU satire
Nov 6 2019, 12:32 by Bola.net
Bola.net - A flood of goals was created in the Champions League match which brought Chelsea vs Ajax Amsterdam. The match which was held at Stamford Bridge on Wednesday (11/06/2019) ended with a score of 4-4.
The Blues were 1-3 behind in the first half with two own goals from Tammy Abraham and Kepa Arrizabalaga, and one goal from Quincy Promes. The host had reduced the score through a penalty Jorginho.
At the beginning of the second half Chelsea's struggle became more difficult after Donny van de Beek increased the position to 1-4 for the visitors. But Chelsea then got up and forced to score three additional goals through Cesar Azpilicueta, Jorginho and Reece James.
In addition to the rain of goals created, a series of drama also colored the match. Ajax Amsterdam must be willing to play with nine players and get a penalty twice.
As for Chelsea, their referee disallowed two goals. Tammy Abraham's goal was ruled out for offside and Cesar Azpilicueta's second goal was canceled by VAR.
Another controversy occurred when the fourth referee gave an additional four minutes. Chelsea manager Frank Lampard was surprised by the decision. Even though in the second half, there were many violations that took a long time.
Suddenly the Chelsea match against Ajax became the talk of social media on Twitter and became a trending topic. Here are some interesting tweets from netizens accompanying this exciting match.
